title: Daini Button Kudasai
sinopse:
At a judo tournament, Akutsu falls in love with Murakami. While jogging, they crashed into each other and Akutsu got hurt (not really, he had a nosebleed due to dirty thoughts). In order to tend to his "wounds" Murakami took him home...

Features Akutsu from Seito Kaichou ni Chuukoku.

(Source: MU)
